title: Wizard Fantastic: 21 Tales of Those Who Dare to Master the Powers and Perils of Realms Beyond the Mortal World
description: An all-original volume offering wizards of all kinds--from sorcerers and geomancers to witchdoctors and shamans--features a collection of stories by Andre Norton, Jane Yolen, Diana Paxson, Mickey Zucker Reichert, John De Chancie, and other notable writers. Reprint.
author: Martin H. Greenberg
